name: InergyHomeConnect
0:
”Alexa, ask My Energy Hub, what is my current demand?”
”Alexa, ask My Energy Hub, what is the current billing period?”
”Alexa, ask My Energy Hub, how much did I save last month?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my energy hub
Developer Terms of Use
des: This application is for use by existing Inergy customers. It allows you to check what the latest energy demand and usage values are now, month-to-date as well as the previous month. It can be used to find out which billing period your home is currently in, and allows you to turn off devices connected to pre-installed relays. Adjustments can made to the demand controller by turning demand control on or off, or by increasing or decreasing the demand limit. Inergy Home Connect can also provide estimates of last month's savings achieved by using a demand controller. A complete set of example phrases is available at https://inergysystems.com/alexa.
